column1: I am of the view  that since it was  the uncontradicted evidence that  the vehicle
which was  the subject matter of the inquiry before the learned Magistrate had
been used only for the purposes of transporting fruit, the instructions given by
the  owner  of  the  vehicle  to  his  driver  should  come  within  the  meaning of  all
precautions he could have taken under the given circumstances.
